title: I'm not hardstuck Bronze... I'm hardstuck honour lvl
body: The climb for honour levels is steep. I could get out of bronze 5 and get to gold quicker than getting to check point 1... If Riot made a punishment for not honouring someone at the end of the game it would be great, because even when I hate my whole team I still honour someone to try and get the "little bit of progress to my honour level". But no one does the same so I'm literally honouring someone for no reason and they just leave the lobby with out doing so. Also where is the honouring the opposing team option? I loved that feature and they took it away.

replies.body: this games not honourable thats why dimsims
Yeah it takes too long to make any progress in honor. I just passed check point 1 on lvl3 anf they just gave me two key fragments...

>If Riot made a punishment for not honouring someone at the end of the game it would be great, because even when I hate my whole team I still honour someone to try and get the "little bit of progress to my honour level".

So what you're saying is, you only honour to benefit yourself? I think you're misunderstanding the purpose of honour. 

Honour is meant to be recognition for playing well or being a good sport or x other honourable thing. It's not meant to be a reward for you just because you want it. You have to *earn* your honour. If it was easy to get it wouldn't mean anything.

I honour people that I think is honour worthy of it, but if I feel like the whole team is trolling I still do it because skipping it is unsportmanlike. But I part from do you agree the honour system for the other team should be brought back?

Skipping it isn't unsportsmanlike, people are going to value honour differently. Some may honour for just not being toxic, some honour just for playing well, and some may only honour those who go above and beyond to be positive. If you don't think anyone deserved honour, don't honour them.

As for bring back enemy honours, it's a feature I want to see back, but to implement it properly in the new system is a bit tricky. The new system thrives on the fact that people actually remember to honour (because of the giant popup). I want it back as a feature, but I'd rather wait and have it done properly than get some bandaid solution that just feels lackluster/meaningless.
Sometimes your whole team don't deserve honours so punishing players for it would be stupid.
